attributes.action: Government should pay to solve floods
attributes.additional_details:
We the British electorate do not understand how QuANGO's, Government Ministers and Local Officials are all blaming each other for allowing so much of our nation to flood while we are sending Billions to foreign countries.

It is not impossible to cope with these events, ask the Dutch.

Money should be found from what we the tax payers pay to help our country future proof ALL the flood precautions for our nation.
